SELECT d.dojang_no , f.food_name , d.leader_id , d.dojang_title , d.dojang_create ,(select count(member_id)+1 from apply a where class_no = 3 and status = '승인' and a.idx = d.dojang_no) as member_count ,(select status from apply a where class_no = 3 and a.idx = d.dojang_no and member_id=#{loginId}) as test , d.dojang_status , d.people_num , d.gender FROM dojanglist d JOIN food f ON d.food_no = f.food_no
ORDER BY d.dojang_no DESC limit #{cnt} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT d.dojang_no ,d.dojang_title ,d.leader_id ,d.people_num ,d.gender ,d.eat_speed ,d.job ,(select count(member_id)+1 from apply a where class_no = 3 and status = '승인' and a.idx = d.dojang_no) as member_count ,(select status from apply a where class_no = 3 and a.idx = d.dojang_no and member_id=#{loginId}) as test ,d.dojang_create ,f.food_name ,d.dojang_content FROM dojanglist d JOIN food f ON d.food_no = f.food_no WHERE d.dojang_no = #{dojang_no}
SELECT g.groupReview_no ,g.member_id ,g.review_title ,review_date FROM groupreview g JOIN dojanglist d ON d.dojang_no = idx AND g.class_no = 3 WHERE d.dojang_no = #{dojang_no}
SELECT eat_speed ,profile_gender ,profile_job FROM profile WHERE member_id = #{param1}
SELECT leader_id FROM dojanglist where dojang_no =#{param1}
SELECT member_id FROM apply WHERE class_no = 3 AND status = '승인' AND idx = #{param1};
